input.content:
# Excel Sheet to Word Bookmark Mapping

Excel VBA workbook (周报生成工具_加权_调整兴动合兴系列.xlsm) has 68 sheets. The 书签表 sheet maps 59 data sheets to Word bookmarks. The Word template has 66 bookmarks total (59 image + 7 text).

## External File Links (externalLink顺序)

**重要:** `[1]`, `[2]`等编号对应xlsm zip中 `xl/externalLinks/` 的顺序，不是链接数据表行号:

| externalLink # | File | 说明 |
|---|-------------|--------|
| [1] | 数据/合享承诺收益率.xlsx | 合享承诺收益率 (静态文件) |
| [2] | 输出结果/输出结果{DATE}.xlsx | Python输出结果 |
| [3] | 数据/产品运作概览数据-母子产品/产品运作概览信息表增加指标变化_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品运作概览 |
| [4] | 数据/产品业绩指标数据/内部产品业绩_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品业绩 |
| [5] | 数据/收益测算数据/丰利合享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 合享底表 |
| [6] | 数据/收益测算数据/悦动稳享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 悦动稳享底表 |

## Text Bookmarks (7个)

| Bookmark | Content Source | Content |
|----------|---------------|---------|
| 首页日期 | 固定格式 | `YYYY年MM月DD日` (如 `2026年02月05日`) |
| 到期日期 | 固定格式 | `YYYY年MM月DD日` (如 `2026年02月05日`) |
| 规模文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B4 | AI生成的规模总结 |
| 中收文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B3 | AI生成的中收总结 |
| 到期文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B2 | AI生成的到期总结 |
| 市场文字 | 留空 (手动填写) | 市场回顾文字 |
| 目标盈 | 留空 (手动填写) | 目标盈内容 |

## Image Bookmarks (59个) - 从书签表读取

### Section 一: 规模及发行情况 (9个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 1、分渠道余额 | 分渠道余额 |
| 渠道明细-透视 | 渠道明细 |
| 2、产品规模 | 系列产品规模 |
| 13.不同周期产品规模 | 周期产品规模 |
| 14.狭义客户周期和最短持有期 | 最短持有期产品规模 |
| 3、本⽉定开或客户周期产品规模变化 | 本月定开及客户周期产品规模变化（大于500w） |
| 本周新起息产品 | 本周在售产品 |
| 待售产品 | 待起息产品清单 |
| 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 | 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 |

### Section 一-5: 产品到期 (3个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 10.未来全年产品到期情况-封闭 | 未来全年产品到期情况——封闭式产品 |
| 10.未来全年产品到期情况-定开 | 未来全年产品到期情况——定开产品 |
| 10.下周到期产品清单 | 下周到期产品清单 |

### Section 二: 产品业绩 (11个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 破净 | 破净情况 |
| 15.指数收益 | 市场指数涨跌 |
| 系列产品业绩-规模加权费前 | 规模加权，费前收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-规模加权费后 | 规模加权，费后收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费前 | 简单平均，费前收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费后 | 简单平均，费后收益 |
| 5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现 (或 5.2_最短持有期产品业绩表现) | 固定收益类持有期系列产品业绩 |
| 招商在售不达基准清单 | 招商在售产品不达基准清单 |
| 封闭及定开产品100日内不大业绩产品清单 | 封闭及定开产品临近到期日不达基准清单 |
| 合享及悦动稳享临近到期预测不达标产品清单 | 合享及悦动稳享临近到期预测不达标产品清单 |
| 12.周净值高波动产品清单 | 周净值高波动产品清单 |

### Section 二-6,7,8: 资产与中收 (14个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 8.资产大表 | 资产持仓金额（亿） |
| 资产大表-占比 | 资产持仓占比 |
| 8.资产大表-含外币 | 产持仓金额含外币产品（亿） |
| 9.中收监控 | 中收监控 |
| 公共策略专户持仓概览 | 公共策略专户持仓概览 |
| 11.衍生品专户产品持仓明细 | 衍生品专户持仓明细 |
| 11.1 可转债专户持仓明细 (或 11.1_可转债专户持仓明细) | 可转债专户持仓明细 |
| 权益持仓 | 权益专户持仓明细 |
| 黄金持仓 | 黄金专户持仓明细 |
| 11.2量化和对冲专户持仓明细 | 量化和对冲专户持仓明细 |
| 11.2.1委外专户金额配置情况 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况持仓金额 |
| 11.2.2其他委外专户配置占比情况-持仓产品平均 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况持仓占比 |
| 11.2.2其他委外专户配置占比情况-系列规模占比 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况系列占比 |
| 11.4其他衍生品专户持仓明细 | 其他衍生品专户持仓明细 |

### Section 三: 各系列产品运作情况 (22个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 最短持有客户周期-新 | 最短持有期 |
| 最短持有客户周期-新-2 | 最短持有期2 |
| 外币低波-1 | 外币低波系列1 |
| 外币低波-2 | 外币低波系列2 |
| 外币低波-3 | 外币低波系列3 |
| 稳系列-1 | 稳系列1 |
| 稳系列-2 | 稳系列2 |
| 稳系列-3 | 稳系列3 |
| 合享-1 | 合享系列1 |
| 合享-2 | 合享系列2 |
| 悦动稳享 | 悦动稳享系列1 |
| 外币市值 | 外币市值类 |
| 债券市值类-2 | 债券市值类1 |
| 债券市值类-3 | 债券市值类2 |
| 债券市值类-4 | 债券市值类3 |
| 债券市值类-5 | 债券市值类4 |
| 含权市值类-1 | 含权市值类1 |
| 含权市值类-1-2 | 含权市值类2 |
| 含权市值类-2 | 含权市值类3 |
| 含权市值类-3 | 含权市值类4 |
| 联名及行内特别款 | 联名及行内特别款 |
| BOF系列 | BOF系列 |

**合计: 59个图片书签 + 7个文字书签 = 66个书签**

## Screenshot Filename → Bookmark Mapping (assemble_word_report.py 中使用)

截图文件名就是sheet名 + `.png`，例如:
- `1、分渠道余额.png` → 书签 "分渠道余额"
- `系列产品业绩-规模加权费前.png` → 书签 "规模加权，费前收益"

注意: 有些sheet名在文件系统中可能有变体（空格 vs 下划线），脚本中同时映射了两种变体:
- `5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现` 和 `5.2_最短持有期产品业绩表现` 都映射到同一个书签
- `11.1 可转债专户持仓明细` 和 `11.1_可转债专户持仓明细` 都映射到同一个书签

# Excel Sheet to Word Bookmark Mapping

Excel VBA workbook (周报生成工具_加权_调整兴动合兴系列.xlsm) has 68 sheets. The 书签表 sheet maps 59 data sheets to Word bookmarks. The Word template has 66 bookmarks total (59 image + 7 text).

## External File Links (externalLink顺序)

**重要:** `[1]`, `[2]`等编号对应xlsm zip中 `xl/externalLinks/` 的顺序，不是链接数据表行号:

| externalLink # | File | 说明 |
|---|-------------|--------|
| [1] | 数据/合享承诺收益率.xlsx | 合享承诺收益率 (静态文件) |
| [2] | 输出结果/输出结果{DATE}.xlsx | Python输出结果 |
| [3] | 数据/产品运作概览数据-母子产品/产品运作概览信息表增加指标变化_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品运作概览 |
| [4] | 数据/产品业绩指标数据/内部产品业绩_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品业绩 |
| [5] | 数据/收益测算数据/丰利合享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 合享底表 |
| [6] | 数据/收益测算数据/悦动稳享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 悦动稳享底表 |

## Text Bookmarks (7个)

| Bookmark | Content Source | Content |
|----------|---------------|---------|
| 首页日期 | 固定格式 | `YYYY年MM月DD日` (如 `2026年02月05日`) |
| 到期日期 | 固定格式 | `YYYY年MM月DD日` (如 `2026年02月05日`) |
| 规模文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B4 | AI生成的规模总结 |
| 中收文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B3 | AI生成的中收总结 |
| 到期文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B2 | AI生成的到期总结 |
| 市场文字 | 留空 (手动填写) | 市场回顾文字 |
| 目标盈 | 留空 (手动填写) | 目标盈内容 |

## Image Bookmarks (59个) - 从书签表读取

### Section 一: 规模及发行情况 (9个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 1、分渠道余额 | 分渠道余额 |
| 渠道明细-透视 | 渠道明细 |
| 2、产品规模 | 系列产品规模 |
| 13.不同周期产品规模 | 周期产品规模 |
| 14.狭义客户周期和最短持有期 | 最短持有期产品规模 |
| 3、本⽉定开或客户周期产品规模变化 | 本月定开及客户周期产品规模变化（大于500w） |
| 本周新起息产品 | 本周在售产品 |
| 待售产品 | 待起息产品清单 |
| 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 | 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 |

### Section 一-5: 产品到期 (3个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 10.未来全年产品到期情况-封闭 | 未来全年产品到期情况——封闭式产品 |
| 10.未来全年产品到期情况-定开 | 未来全年产品到期情况——定开产品 |
| 10.下周到期产品清单 | 下周到期产品清单 |

### Section 二: 产品业绩 (11个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 破净 | 破净情况 |
| 15.指数收益 | 市场指数涨跌 |
| 系列产品业绩-规模加权费前 | 规模加权，费前收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-规模加权费后 | 规模加权，费后收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费前 | 简单平均，费前收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费后 | 简单平均，费后收益 |
| 5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现 (或 5.2_最短持有期产品业绩表现) | 固定收益类持有期系列产品业绩 |
| 招商在售不达基准清单 | 招商在售产品不达基准清单 |
| 封闭及定开产品100日内不大业绩产品清单 | 封闭及定开产品临近到期日不达基准清单 |
| 合享及悦动稳享临近到期预测不达标产品清单 | 合享及悦动稳享临近到期预测不达标产品清单 |
| 12.周净值高波动产品清单 | 周净值高波动产品清单 |

### Section 二-6,7,8: 资产与中收 (14个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 8.资产大表 | 资产持仓金额（亿） |
| 资产大表-占比 | 资产持仓占比 |
| 8.资产大表-含外币 | 产持仓金额含外币产品（亿） |
| 9.中收监控 | 中收监控 |
| 公共策略专户持仓概览 | 公共策略专户持仓概览 |
| 11.衍生品专户产品持仓明细 | 衍生品专户持仓明细 |
| 11.1 可转债专户持仓明细 (或 11.1_可转债专户持仓明细) | 可转债专户持仓明细 |
| 权益持仓 | 权益专户持仓明细 |
| 黄金持仓 | 黄金专户持仓明细 |
| 11.2量化和对冲专户持仓明细 | 量化和对冲专户持仓明细 |
| 11.2.1委外专户金额配置情况 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况持仓金额 |
| 11.2.2其他委外专户配置占比情况-持仓产品平均 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况持仓占比 |
| 11.2.2其他委外专户配置占比情况-系列规模占比 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况系列占比 |
| 11.4其他衍生品专户持仓明细 | 其他衍生品专户持仓明细 |

### Section 三: 各系列产品运作情况 (22个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 最短持有客户周期-新 | 最短持有期 |
| 最短持有客户周期-新-2 | 最短持有期2 |
| 外币低波-1 | 外币低波系列1 |
| 外币低波-2 | 外币低波系列2 |
| 外币低波-3 | 外币低波系列3 |
| 稳系列-1 | 稳系列1 |
| 稳系列-2 | 稳系列2 |
| 稳系列-3 | 稳系列3 |
| 合享-1 | 合享系列1 |
| 合享-2 | 合享系列2 |
| 悦动稳享 | 悦动稳享系列1 |
| 外币市值 | 外币市值类 |
| 债券市值类-2 | 债券市值类1 |
| 债券市值类-3 | 债券市值类2 |
| 债券市值类-4 | 债券市值类3 |
| 债券市值类-5 | 债券市值类4 |
| 含权市值类-1 | 含权市值类1 |
| 含权市值类-1-2 | 含权市值类2 |
| 含权市值类-2 | 含权市值类3 |
| 含权市值类-3 | 含权市值类4 |
| 联名及行内特别款 | 联名及行内特别款 |
| BOF系列 | BOF系列 |

**合计: 59个图片书签 + 7个文字书签 = 66个书签**

## Screenshot Filename → Bookmark Mapping (assemble_word_report.py 中使用)

截图文件名就是sheet名 + `.png`，例如:
- `1、分渠道余额.png` → 书签 "分渠道余额"
- `系列产品业绩-规模加权费前.png` → 书签 "规模加权，费前收益"

注意: 有些sheet名在文件系统中可能有变体（空格 vs 下划线），脚本中同时映射了两种变体:
- `5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现` 和 `5.2_最短持有期产品业绩表现` 都映射到同一个书签
- `11.1 可转债专户持仓明细` 和 `11.1_可转债专户持仓明细` 都映射到同一个书签

lines: # Excel Sheet to Word Bookmark Mapping
-Excel VBA workbook (周报生成工具_加权_调整兴动合兴系列.xlsm) has 68 sheets. The 书签表 sheet maps data sheets to Word bookmarks.
+Excel VBA workbook (周报生成工具_加权_调整兴动合兴系列.xlsm) has 68 sheets. The 书签表 sheet maps 59 data sheets to Word bookmarks. The Word template has 66 bookmarks total (59 image + 7 text).
-## Bookmark Categories
+## External File Links (externalLink顺序)
-### Dates & Text (6 bookmarks)
-| Bookmark | Source | Content Type |
-| 首页日期 | 周报生成流程 sheet | Date text: "数据截止时间 20260205" |
-| 到期日期 | 周报生成流程 sheet | Date text: "*自 20260205 起" |
-| 规模文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | AI-generated AUM summary paragraph |
-| 到期文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | AI-generated maturity summary |
-| 市场文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | Market review text (2 sub-sections: 债券+权益+转债) |
-| 中收文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | AI-generated fee income summary |
+**重要:** `[1]`, `[2]`等编号对应xlsm zip中 `xl/externalLinks/` 的顺序，不是链接数据表行号:
-### Section 一: 规模及发行情况 (9 bookmarks → images)
+| externalLink # | File | 说明 |
+| [1] | 数据/合享承诺收益率.xlsx | 合享承诺收益率 (静态文件) |
+| [2] | 输出结果/输出结果{DATE}.xlsx | Python输出结果 |
+| [3] | 数据/产品运作概览数据-母子产品/产品运作概览信息表增加指标变化_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品运作概览 |
+| [4] | 数据/产品业绩指标数据/内部产品业绩_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品业绩 |
+| [5] | 数据/收益测算数据/丰利合享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 合享底表 |
+| [6] | 数据/收益测算数据/悦动稳享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 悦动稳享底表 |
+## Text Bookmarks (7个)
+| Bookmark | Content Source | Content |
+| 首页日期 | 固定格式 | `YYYY年MM月DD日` (如 `2026年02月05日`) |
+| 到期日期 | 固定格式 | `YYYY年MM月DD日` (如 `2026年02月05日`) |
+| 规模文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B4 | AI生成的规模总结 |
+| 中收文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B3 | AI生成的中收总结 |
+| 到期文字 | 输出结果.xlsx → 总结文字 sheet B2 | AI生成的到期总结 |
+| 市场文字 | 留空 (手动填写) | 市场回顾文字 |
+| 目标盈 | 留空 (手动填写) | 目标盈内容 |
+## Image Bookmarks (59个) - 从书签表读取
+### Section 一: 规模及发行情况 (9个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
| 1、分渠道余额 | 分渠道余额 |
| 2、产品规模 | 系列产品规模 |
| 13.不同周期产品规模 | 周期产品规模 |
| 14.狭义客户周期和最短持有期 | 最短持有期产品规模 |
-| 3、本月定开或客户周期产品规模变化 | 本月定开及客户周期产品规模变化（大于500w） |
+| 3、本⽉定开或客户周期产品规模变化 | 本月定开及客户周期产品规模变化（大于500w） |
| 本周新起息产品 | 本周在售产品 |
| 待售产品 | 待起息产品清单 |
| 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 | 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 |
-### Section 一-5: 产品到期 (3 bookmarks → images)
+### Section 一-5: 产品到期 (3个)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |

| 10.下周到期产品清单 | 下周到期产品清单 |
-### Section 二: 产品业绩 (12 bookmarks → images)
+### Section 二: 产品业绩 (11个)

| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费后 | 简单平均，费后收益 |
-| 5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现 | 固定收益类持有期系列产品业绩 |

+### Section 二-6,7,8: 资产与中收 (14个)

-| 6 | 悦动稳享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 收益测算数据/ |

+- `1、分渠道余额.png` → 书签 "分渠道余额"
+- `系列产品业绩-规模加权费前.png` → 书签 "规模加权，费前收益"
+注意: 有些sheet名在文件系统中可能有变体（空格 vs 下划线），脚本中同时映射了两种变体:
+- `5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现` 和 `5.2_最短持有期产品业绩表现` 都映射到同一个书签
+- `11.1 可转债专户持仓明细` 和 `11.1_可转债专户持仓明细` 都映射到同一个书签

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# Excel Sheet to Word Bookmark Mapping

Excel VBA workbook (周报生成工具_加权_调整兴动合兴系列.xlsm) has 68 sheets. The 书签表 sheet maps data sheets to Word bookmarks.

## Bookmark Categories

### Dates & Text (6 bookmarks)
| Bookmark | Source | Content Type |
|----------|--------|--------------|
| 首页日期 | 周报生成流程 sheet | Date text: "数据截止时间 20260205" |
| 到期日期 | 周报生成流程 sheet | Date text: "*自 20260205 起" |
| 规模文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | AI-generated AUM summary paragraph |
| 到期文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | AI-generated maturity summary |
| 市场文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | Market review text (2 sub-sections: 债券+权益+转债) |
| 中收文字 | 周报文字更新 sheet | AI-generated fee income summary |

### Section 一: 规模及发行情况 (9 bookmarks → images)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 1、分渠道余额 | 分渠道余额 |
| 渠道明细-透视 | 渠道明细 |
| 2、产品规模 | 系列产品规模 |
| 13.不同周期产品规模 | 周期产品规模 |
| 14.狭义客户周期和最短持有期 | 最短持有期产品规模 |
| 3、本月定开或客户周期产品规模变化 | 本月定开及客户周期产品规模变化（大于500w） |
| 本周新起息产品 | 本周在售产品 |
| 待售产品 | 待起息产品清单 |
| 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 | 投资经理维度产品规模和数量 |

### Section 一-5: 产品到期 (3 bookmarks → images)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 10.未来全年产品到期情况-封闭 | 未来全年产品到期情况——封闭式产品 |
| 10.未来全年产品到期情况-定开 | 未来全年产品到期情况——定开产品 |
| 10.下周到期产品清单 | 下周到期产品清单 |

### Section 二: 产品业绩 (12 bookmarks → images)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 破净 | 破净情况 |
| 15.指数收益 | 市场指数涨跌 |
| 系列产品业绩-规模加权费前 | 规模加权，费前收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-规模加权费后 | 规模加权，费后收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费前 | 简单平均，费前收益 |
| 系列产品业绩-简单平均费后 | 简单平均，费后收益 |
| 5.2 最短持有期产品业绩表现 | 固定收益类持有期系列产品业绩 |
| 招商在售不达基准清单 | 招商在售产品不达基准清单 |
| 封闭及定开产品100日内不大业绩产品清单 | 封闭及定开产品临近到期日不达基准清单 |
| 合享及悦动稳享临近到期预测不达标产品清单 | 合享及悦动稳享临近到期预测不达标产品清单 |
| 12.周净值高波动产品清单 | 周净值高波动产品清单 |

### Section 二-6,7,8: 资产与中收 (14 bookmarks → images)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 8.资产大表 | 资产持仓金额（亿） |
| 资产大表-占比 | 资产持仓占比 |
| 8.资产大表-含外币 | 产持仓金额含外币产品（亿） |
| 9.中收监控 | 中收监控 |
| 公共策略专户持仓概览 | 公共策略专户持仓概览 |
| 11.衍生品专户产品持仓明细 | 衍生品专户持仓明细 |
| 11.1 可转债专户持仓明细 | 可转债专户持仓明细 |
| 权益持仓 | 权益专户持仓明细 |
| 黄金持仓 | 黄金专户持仓明细 |
| 11.2量化和对冲专户持仓明细 | 量化和对冲专户持仓明细 |
| 11.2.1委外专户金额配置情况 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况持仓金额 |
| 11.2.2其他委外专户配置占比情况-持仓产品平均 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况持仓占比 |
| 11.2.2其他委外专户配置占比情况-系列规模占比 | 其他公共策略专户持仓情况系列占比 |
| 11.4其他衍生品专户持仓明细 | 其他衍生品专户持仓明细 |

### Section 三: 各系列产品运作情况 (27 bookmarks → images)
| Excel Sheet | Word Bookmark |
|-------------|---------------|
| 最短持有客户周期-新 | 最短持有期-1 |

| 最短持有客户周期-新-3 | 最短持有期-3 |

| 稳系列-2 | 稳系列-2 |
| 稳系列-3 | 稳系列-3 |
| 合享-1 | 合享-1 |
| 合享-2 | 合享-2 |
| 悦动稳享 | 悦动稳享 |
| 外币市值 | 外币市值 |
| 目标盈 | 目标盈 |

| 债券市值类-3 | 债券市值类-3 |
| 债券市值类-4 | 债券市值类-4 |

| 联名及行内特别款 | 联名及行内特别款 |

## External File Links (链接数据表)

The VBA workbook links to 6 external data files via VLOOKUP formulas:

| # | File Pattern | Source |
|---|-------------|--------|
| 1 | 输出结果{DATE}.xlsx | Python generate_report.py output |
| 2 | 产品运作概览信息表增加指标变化_{DATE}.xlsx | 产品运作概览数据-母子产品/ |

| 6 | 悦动稳享底表-{DATE}.xlsx | 收益测算数据/ |

message.content:
Your task is to create a detailed summary of the conversation so far, paying close attention to the user's explicit requests and your previous actions.
This summary should be thorough in capturing technical details, code patterns, and architectural decisions that would be essential for continuing development work without losing context.

Before providing your final summary, wrap your analysis in <analysis> tags to organize your thoughts and ensure you've covered all necessary points. In your analysis process:

1. Chronologically analyze each message and section of the conversation. For each section thoroughly identify:
   - The user's explicit requests and intents
   - Your approach to addressing the user's requests
   - Key decisions, technical concepts and code patterns
   - Specific details like:
     - file names
     - full code snippets
     - function signatures
     - file edits
  - Errors that you ran into and how you fixed them
  - Pay special attention to specific user feedback that you received, especially if the user told you to do something differently.
2. Double-check for technical accuracy and completeness, addressing each required element thoroughly.

Your summary should include the following sections:

1. Primary Request and Intent: Capture all of the user's explicit requests and intents in detail
2. Key Technical Concepts: List all important technical concepts, technologies, and frameworks discussed.
3. Files and Code Sections: Enumerate specific files and code sections examined, modified, or created. Pay special attention to the most recent messages and include full code snippets where applicable and include a summary of why this file read or edit is important.
4. Errors and fixes: List all errors that you ran into, and how you fixed them. Pay special attention to specific user feedback that you received, especially if the user told you to do something differently.
5. Problem Solving: Document problems solved and any ongoing troubleshooting efforts.
6. All user messages: List ALL user messages that are not tool results. These are critical for understanding the users' feedback and changing intent.
6. Pending Tasks: Outline any pending tasks that you have explicitly been asked to work on.
7. Current Work: Describe in detail precisely what was being worked on immediately before this summary request, paying special attention to the most recent messages from both user and assistant. Include file names and code snippets where applicable.
8. Optional Next Step: List the next step that you will take that is related to the most recent work you were doing. IMPORTANT: ensure that this step is DIRECTLY in line with the user's most recent explicit requests, and the task you were working on immediately before this summary request. If your last task was concluded, then only list next steps if they are explicitly in line with the users request. Do not start on tangential requests or really old requests that were already completed without confirming with the user first.
                       If there is a next step, include direct quotes from the most recent conversation showing exactly what task you were working on and where you left off. This should be verbatim to ensure there's no drift in task interpretation.

Here's an example of how your output should be structured:

<example>
<analysis>
[Your thought process, ensuring all points are covered thoroughly and accurately]
</analysis>

<summary>
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   [Detailed description]

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - [Concept 1]
   - [Concept 2]
   - [...]

3. Files and Code Sections:
   - [File Name 1]
      - [Summary of why this file is important]
      - [Summary of the changes made to this file, if any]
      - [Important Code Snippet]
   - [File Name 2]
      - [Important Code Snippet]
   - [...]

4. Errors and fixes:
    - [Detailed description of error 1]:
      - [How you fixed the error]
      - [User feedback on the error if any]
    - [...]

5. Problem Solving:
   [Description of solved problems and ongoing troubleshooting]

6. All user messages: 
    - [Detailed non tool use user message]
    - [...]

7. Pending Tasks:
   - [Task 1]
   - [Task 2]
   - [...]

8. Current Work:
   [Precise description of current work]

9. Optional Next Step:
   [Optional Next step to take]

</summary>
</example>

Please provide your summary based on the conversation so far, following this structure and ensuring precision and thoroughness in your response. 

There may be additional summarization instructions provided in the included context. If so, remember to follow these instructions when creating the above summary. Examples of instructions include:
<example>
## Compact Instructions
When summarizing the conversation focus on typescript code changes and also remember the mistakes you made and how you fixed them.
</example>

<example>
# Summary instructions
When you are using compact - please focus on test output and code changes. Include file reads verbatim.
</example>


IMPORTANT: Do NOT use any tools. You MUST respond with ONLY the <summary>...</summary> block as your text output.

content.text:
<analysis>
Let me analyze the conversation chronologically to build a comprehensive summary.

**Context from previous sessions (summarized at start):**
- User asked to generate weekly report for 2026-02-05 using `/weekly-report` skill
- Steps 1-4 were completed in previous sessions
- Step 4 (screenshots) was the major work - VLOOKUP formula resolution, 59/59 screenshots generated
- Step 5 (Word/PDF assembly) was in progress when context ran out

**This session's work:**

1. **Continuing Step 5 - Word/PDF Assembly:**
   - Verified 59 screenshots exist at `/tmp/weekly_report_screenshots/`
   - Read bookmark mapping from 书签表 (59 image bookmarks)
   - Read AI summary text from 总结文字 sheet (B2=到期文字, B3=中收文字, B4=规模文字)
   - Analyzed Word template bookmark XML structure using zipfile + lxml
   - Discovered all 66 bookmarks are empty (bookmarkStart immediately followed by bookmarkEnd)
   - Examined page dimensions: A4, 720 twip margins, content width = 10466 twips

2. **Writing the assembly script** (`/tmp/assemble_word_report.py`):
   - Convert .docm to .docx by stripping VBA
   - Parse document.xml with lxml to find bookmarks
   - Insert text at text bookmarks (5 filled, 2 left empty)
   - Insert 59 PNG images at image bookmarks with proper OOXML inline drawing XML
   - Add PNG content type to [Content_Types].xml
   - Successfully ran: 5 text blocks + 59 images inserted, 13MB docx

3. **PDF Generation challenges:**
   - docx2pdf failed: "信息无法识别" error
   - AppleScript "save as" failed repeatedly: -1708 error ("不理解save as信息")
   - JXA `exportAs` said "Exported" but no file was generated
   - System Events keystroke automation blocked: "osascript不允许发送按键"
   - Word VBA macro approach failed: "run VB macro不能继续"
   - **Solution:** Installed LibreOffice via `brew install --cask libreoffice`
   - `soffice --headless --convert-to pdf` worked perfectly → 57-page, 12.3MB PDF

4. **PDF Verification:**
   - Checked pages 1-3: Title page with date, TOC, 规模文字 + 分渠道余额 table
   - Checked pages 4-8: 渠道明细, 产品规模, 周期产品, 本周新起息, 投资经理维度
   - Checked pages 9-13: 到期情况, 到期文字, 破净, 指数收益, 系列产品业绩 (4 variants), 固定收益持有期
   - Checked pages 54-57: 联名及行内特别款, BOF系列 - final pages of report

5. **Memory update:** Updated MEMORY.md with full pipeline status

6. **User request: "请更新skills"**
   - Read current SKILL.md and references/bookmark_mapping.md
   - Updated SKILL.md with battle-tested information:
     - Added LibreOffice as prerequisite
     - Updated Step 4 with actual script location, external file mapping, openpyxl warnings, formula patterns
     - Rewrote Step 5 with actual working approach (zipfile+lxml, not python-docx)
     - Added error handling for all discovered issues
   - Updated bookmark_mapping.md:
     - Corrected external file link numbering ([1]=合享承诺收益率, not 输出结果)
     - Updated bookmark names to match actual Word template (e.g., 最短持有期 not 最短持有期-1)
     - Added text bookmark content sources
     - Added screenshot filename mapping notes

Key files modified/created:
- `/tmp/assemble_word_report.py` (created, ~494 lines)
- `/Users/fanshengxia/.claude/skills/weekly-report/SKILL.md` (updated)
- `/Users/fanshengxia/.claude/skills/weekly-report/references/bookmark_mapping.md` (updated)
- `/Users/fanshengxia/.claude/projects/-Users-fanshengxia-Desktop---V2/memory/MEMORY.md` (updated)

User messages in this session:
1. (Continuation from previous session - no explicit user message, just system summary)
2. (PDF page images shown by system as tool results)
3. "请更新skills" - explicit request to update the skill files
</analysis>

<summary>
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   The user's original request was "请尝试一下生成2026年2月5日的周报" (try generating the Feb 5, 2026 weekly report) using the `/weekly-report` skill. This session continued from where the previous session left off (Step 5: Word/PDF assembly). After the report was successfully generated, the user explicitly requested "请更新skills" to update the weekly-report skill files with the battle-tested knowledge gained from the actual execution.

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - **OOXML bookmark manipulation**: Word documents use `<w:bookmarkStart>` and `<w:bookmarkEnd>` XML elements. All 66 bookmarks in the template are empty (start/end adjacent). Content is inserted between them using lxml.
   - **OOXML inline image XML**: Images in Word require: (1) PNG file in `word/media/`, (2) Relationship entry in `word/_rels/document.xml.rels`, (3) `<w:r><w:drawing><wp:inline>` XML with proper namespaces (w, wp, a, pic, r).
   - **EMU (English Metric Units)**: 1 inch = 914,400 EMU. At 96 DPI: 1 pixel = 9,525 EMU. A4 content width = 10,466 twips = 6,645,910 EMU.
   - **Converting .docm to .docx**: Strip VBA by removing `word/vbaProject.bin`, `word/vbaData.xml`, `word/_rels/vbaProject.bin.rels` and changing content type from `macroEnabled.main+xml` to normal `document.main+xml`.
   - **python-docx cannot open .docm files**: Raises `ValueError` on macro-enabled content type. Must use zipfile+lxml approach.
   - **LibreOffice headless PDF conversion**: `soffice --headless --convert-to pdf` is the most reliable approach on Mac. Word for Mac AppleScript `save as` returns -1708 error.
   - **PNG content type in [Content_Types].xml**: Must add `<Default Extension="png" ContentType="image/png"/>` when inserting PNG images.
   - **Multi-line text in Word bookmarks**: First line goes into the bookmark's paragraph; subsequent lines create new paragraphs (copy pPr but exclude sectPr).

3. Files and Code Sections:

   - **`/tmp/assemble_word_report.py`** (CREATED, ~494 lines)
     - Core Step 5 script that assembles the final Word report from screenshots + AI text
     - Converts .docm → .docx, inserts text/images at bookmarks, handles OOXML XML
     - Key components:
       - `BOOKMARK_MAP`: dict mapping 59 sheet names → Word bookmark names
       - `convert_docm_to_docx()`: Strips VBA from .docm via zipfile
       - `build_image_run_xml()`: Constructs OOXML inline drawing XML for images
       - `build_text_run_xml()`: Constructs text run XML with font settings
       - `insert_multiline_text_at_bookmark()`: Handles multi-line text (creates new paragraphs)
       - `assemble_report()`: Main function - loads text, converts template, inserts all content
     - Successfully produces 13MB .docx with 59 images + 5 text blocks

   - **`/Users/fanshengxia/.claude/skills/weekly-report/SKILL.md`** (UPDATED)
     - Updated with battle-tested knowledge from actual execution
     - Key changes: Added LibreOffice prerequisite, rewrote Steps 4-5 with actual working code, added external file mapping correction ([1]=合享承诺收益率 not 输出结果), added openpyxl `read_only=True` warning, documented formula patterns and coverage, replaced theoretical python-docx approach with working zipfile+lxml approach, added all error handling lessons

   - **`/Users/fanshengxia/.claude/skills/weekly-report/references/bookmark_mapping.md`** (UPDATED)
     - Corrected external file link numbering to match actual externalLink order in xlsm zip
     - Updated bookmark names to match actual Word template (e.g., "最短持有期" not "最短持有期-1")
     - Added text bookmark content sources (总结文字 sheet B2/B3/B4)
     - Added screenshot filename → bookmark mapping notes

   - **`/Users/fanshengxia/.claude/projects/-Users-fanshengxia-Desktop---V2/memory/MEMORY.md`** (UPDATED)
     - Updated with complete pipeline status for all 5 steps
     - Documented key technical findings (openpyxl EmptyCell bug, LibreOffice for PDF, etc.)

   - **`/Users/fanshengxia/Desktop/周报V2/输出结果/多资产投资部产品周报-20260205.docx`** (GENERATED)
     - 13MB Word document with 222 paragraphs, 8 sections, 59 inline shapes

   - **`/Users/fanshengxia/Desktop/周报V2/输出结果/多资产投资部产品周报-20260205.pdf`** (GENERATED)
     - 12.3MB, 57 pages, generated via LibreOffice headless

4. Errors and Fixes:

   - **docx2pdf conversion failed** with "信息无法识别" error:
     - Root cause: Unknown - possibly XML compatibility issue with Word for Mac
     - Fix: Switched to LibreOffice headless

   - **AppleScript "save as" failed** with -1708 error ("不理解save as信息"):
     - Tried multiple AppleScript syntaxes: `save as theDoc`, `tell document 1 to save as`, direct object reference
     - Root cause: Word for Mac Chinese localization doesn't support the `save as` AppleScript verb
     - Fix: Installed LibreOffice (`brew install --cask libreoffice`)

   - **JXA `exportAs` returned "Exported" but no PDF was generated**:
     - Root cause: The JXA command executed without error but the format parameter wasn't correctly interpreted
     - Fix: Used LibreOffice instead

   - **System Events keystroke automation blocked**: "osascript不允许发送按键" (1002 error)
     - Root cause: macOS security prevents osascript from sending keystrokes without accessibility permissions
     - Fix: Abandoned UI automation approach, used LibreOffice

   - **Word VBA macro execution failed**: "run VB macro不能继续" (-1708)
     - Root cause: The .docx file (converted from .docm) doesn't support VBA macros
     - Fix: Used LibreOffice

5. Problem Solving:
   - **Solved**: Complete Word/PDF assembly pipeline - converting .docm template to .docx, inserting 59 images + 5 text blocks at bookmarks, generating 57-page PDF
   - **Solved**: PDF generation on Mac - after trying 5 different approaches (docx2pdf, AppleScript, JXA, System Events, Word VBA), LibreOffice headless was the reliable solution
   - **Solved**: Skill files updated with all battle-tested knowledge from the actual execution

6. All User Messages:
   - (Session started with system summary from previous context - no explicit user message for continuation)
   - "请更新skills" - User requested updating the weekly-report skill files with lessons learned

7. Pending Tasks:
   - None. The weekly report generation pipeline is fully complete (Steps 1-5), and the skill files have been updated as requested.

8. Current Work:
   The most recent work was updating the weekly-report skill files per the user's request "请更新skills". Both files were successfully updated:
   - `SKILL.md`: Rewritten with actual working approach for Steps 4-5, corrected external file mapping, added all error handling lessons
   - `references/bookmark_mapping.md`: Corrected bookmark names, external file numbering, added text bookmark sources
   
   The skill update is complete. Both files have been written successfully.

9. Optional Next Step:
   No pending next steps. The user's two requests in this conversation have both been completed:
   1. Generate the 20260205 weekly report → Done (57-page PDF at `输出结果/多资产投资部产品周报-20260205.pdf`)
   2. Update skills → Done (SKILL.md and bookmark_mapping.md both updated)
   
   One consideration for future improvement: The two working scripts (`/tmp/generate_excel_screenshots_v2.py` and `/tmp/assemble_word_report.py`) are stored in `/tmp/` which is volatile. They should ideally be moved to a permanent location in the project directory. However, the user has not requested this, so it should only be done if asked.
</summary>
